channel.title: Comments on: Getting Smarter About My Smartphone
channel.description: Tech news worth talking about and tech help worth listening to

item.title: By: Robert Watson
item.dc:creator: Robert Watson
item.description: I've bookmarked this page. Great information for a great phone.
item.content:encoded: I’ve bookmarked this page. Great information for a great phone.

item.title: By: Christian
item.dc:creator: Christian
item.description: Thanks for writing this! I just purchased a GSIII and am trying to learn all I can in between parenting & work. This helps a lot! :-)
item.content:encoded: Thanks for writing this! I just purchased a GSIII and am trying to learn all I can in between parenting & work. This helps a lot!

item.title: By: The GS3 is an awesome phone! - Android Forums

item.description: [...] it so awesome. Virtually all the tips I wrote I discovered on this forum. So, thanks you guys! Check out the article, leave a comment and let me know what I missed. -Tom Braun [...]
